# **Welcome to the Fisheries and Marine Ecosystem Model Intercomparison Project (FishMIP)**
:::

FishMIP is a network of more than 100 marine ecosystem modellers and researchers from around the world.

## We answer questions about the future of:

-   Fish & Fisheries

-   Seafood supply

-   Marine biodiversity

-   Marine ecosystem functioning

## Our goal

is to bring together diverse marine ecosystem models to help better understand and project the long-term impacts of climate change on fisheries and marine ecosystems, and to use our findings to help inform policy.
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: {style="margin: 2em"}
## Part of a wider climate impact model community

FishMIP contributes to the [**Intersectoral Impact Model Intercomparison Project (ISIMIP)**](https://www.isimip.org/){.email-link}.
:::
